# Definer funktion

```{r}
# Monte Carlo-simulering af pure strategy
monte_carlo_simulation <- function(df, result_char, pred_col, odds_col, diff_col, 
          result_col, threshold = 0.025, bet_amount = 100, simulations = 10000) {
  # Filtrer kampene, hvor forskellen overstiger threshold
  df <- df[df[[diff_col]] >= threshold, ]
  
  # Hvis ingen kampe opfylder threshold, afslut
  if (nrow(df) == 0) {
    cat("\n Ingen kampe opfylder threshold =", threshold, "\n")
    return(NULL)
  }
  
  # Vektor til at gemme profitten fra hver simulation
  profits <- numeric(simulations)
  
  #for reproducerbarhed
  set.seed(42)
  # Monte Carlo-simulering
  for (i in 1:simulations) {
    # Random sampling med tilbagel√¶gning
    sampled_df <- df[sample(nrow(df), replace = TRUE), ]
    
    # Beregn profit for hver kamp
    sampled_df$profit <- ifelse(sampled_df[[result_col]] == result_char, 
                    (sampled_df[[odds_col]] * bet_amount) - bet_amount,-bet_amount)
    
    # Summer profitten fra alle kampe i denne simulation
    profits[i] <- sum(sampled_df$profit)
  }
  
  # Plot histogram over profitfordelingen
  hist(profits, breaks = 50, main = paste("Monte Carlo Simulation:", result_char,    "Pure Strategy"), xlab = "Profit (DKK)", col = "gray", border = "black")
  
  # Output af resultater
  cat("\n Resultat:", result_char, "\n")
  cat("Threshold:", threshold, "\n")
  cat("Antal kampe opfylder threshold:", nrow(df), "\n")
  cat("Gennemsnitlig profit pr. simulation:", mean(profits), "DKK\n")
  cat("Median profit pr. simulation:", median(profits), "DKK\n")
  cat("Varians af profit pr. simulation:", var(profits), "DKK¬≤\n")  
  cat("Andel af simulationer med overskud:", mean(profits > 0) * 100, "%\n")
  
  # Hoeffding inequality analyse ----
  n <- nrow(df)  # antal value bets per simulation
  mean_profit_total <- mean(profits)
  mean_profit_per_bet <- mean_profit_total / n

  # Konfidensniveau
  delta <- 0.05

  # a = -100 kr (tab), b = gennemsnitlig gevinst
  avg_odds <- mean(df[[odds_col]])
  a <- -bet_amount
  b <- (avg_odds * bet_amount) - bet_amount

  # Klassisk Hoeffding epsilon og nedre gr√¶nse
  epsilon <- sqrt(((b - a)^2 * log(1 / delta)) / (2 * n))
  lower_bound <- mean_profit_per_bet - epsilon

  # Beregn hvilken delta der g√∏r at lower bound = 0
  # alts√•: epsilon = mean_profit_per_bet => delta = 2 * exp(-2n * mean^2 / (b-a)^2)
  if (mean_profit_per_bet > 0) {
    delta_required <- exp(-2 * n * mean_profit_per_bet^2 / ((b - a)^2))
    if(delta_required > 1) {
      delta_required <- 1
    }
  } else {
    delta_required <- 1  # ingen konfidens for profit
  }

  # ---- UDSKRIV RESULTATER ----
  cat("\n--- Hoeffding og Binomial Analyse ---\n")
  cat("Gennemsnitlig profit per kamp:", round(mean_profit_per_bet, 2), "kr\n")
  
  cat("\n Vi er 95% sikre p√• f√∏lgende profit eller mere -> \n")
  cat("Hoeffding epsilon (95%):", round(epsilon, 2), "kr\n")
  cat("Nedre 95% gr√¶nse for forventet profit:", round(lower_bound, 2), "kr\n")
  
  cat("\n Med hvilken sandsynlighed f√•r vi profit per bet p√• 0kr eller mere -> \n")
  cat("N√∏dvendig delta for at sikre at Œº ‚â• 0:", round((1-delta_required)*100, 4),"% \n")
  cat("-------------------------------------------------------------------")
}
```
